description:
**Fix Overview**:

To enable automatic updates for the next version of your application, ensure that .NET Framework 4.7.1 is installed on the server. If this prerequisite is not met, it may prevent the auto-update process.

1. Check if .NET Framework 4.7.1 is installed on your server.
2. If it is not installed, download and install .NET Framework 4.7.1 from the official Microsoft website.
3. Once the installation is complete, restart the server to apply the changes.
4. Confirm that automatic updates are configured correctly in your system settings.

**Details**:
- Ensuring the required .NET version is present is crucial for compatibility with subsequent software updates. Always refer to Microsoft documentation for specific requirements and instructions relevant to your system. (LLM Synthesized)
